title: Out of the fiery furnace. Parts 1-3
creator_credit: Opus Films, Robert Raymond and Christopher McCullough
brief_description: A history of metals presented on camera and narrated by Michael Charlton. This video features (1)From Stone to Bronze, (2) Swords and Ploughshares, (3) Shining Conquests.
